headline: Comcast (CMCSA) Positioned for Resilience and Growth Amid Market Volatility and U.S. Tax Tailwinds
summary: Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) is one of the 10 best defensive stocks to buy in a volatile market. On July 7, Citi analysts said U.S. tax reforms—including full bonus depreciation and expanded interest expense deductions—are set to boost cash flows for North American telecom operators.
